summary: The future tag explores the evolving concept of ecosystems, which traditionally are defined by space and time in biology, but now extend to decentralized, non-hierarchical structures beyond geographic boundaries in modern contexts. Through the lens of decentralization and regenerative practices, it aims to inspire innovative practices in various fields, proposing a new approach called ecosystem architecture.
excerpt: Biological ecosystems are defined by space and time, but modern ecosystems transcend these. Ecosystem architecture proposes decentralized, non-hierarchical structures inspired by diverse disciplines.
